title: Impending Survey Discussion Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author's blogging has decreased for Thanksgiving week.
- A new SSC survey will be posted in a few weeks.
- The author welcomes suggestions about what questions to ask and any methodology issues from his audience.

Key learnings:
- None directly stated in this portion of the blog post.

Key questions:
- What questions do readers want included on the upcoming SSC survey?
- What methodology issues have bothered past survey respondents?
